name: Gaol Break
description:
Gaol Break was my first solo entry to Ludum Dare 21, with the theme “Escape”. It was written in ActionScript, using FlashPunk.

I’m pretty happy with how it turned out. I think I’m most proud of the sprite-work, and the footprints game mechanic. My only regret is that I didn’t spend enough time developing levels.

Controls

  • WASD/Arrow Keys: Move
  • M: Toggle awful music
